com.phunware.alerts

Class PwAlertsSubscriptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.phunware.alerts.PwAlertsSubscriptions

  • public final class PwAlertsSubscriptions
extends Object
    Use this to view and make changes to subscription groups.

    Get a list of subscriptions from the server using getSubscriptionGroups(Context context). This will return an array of PwSubscription objects. Each subscription will have a populated id and name field. However, the isSubscribed flag will be false.

    The server maintains a subscription state, but that state is not sent back in that call. It is up to the developer to maintain state of subscribed subscriptions locally, either through SharedPreferences, an SQLiteDatabase or another preferred method.

    When the Alerts module is first installed (either as fresh install or as the first time running the module), a call is made to register the device for push alerts. After a successful registration, a call is made to unsubscribe from all subscriptions.

    • Method Detail

      • getSubscriptionGroups

        public static List<PwSubscription> getSubscriptionGroups(android.content.Context context)
                                                  throws PwException
        Get all available subscription groups from the server. This will not include subscribed states for the subscriptions. This should be called outside of the UI thread.
        Parameters:
        context - Context The application context
        Returns:
        An List of PwSubscription objects.
        Throws:
        PwException - if there was a network error or if there is no Internet connection.

      • saveSubscriptions

        public static void saveSubscriptions(android.content.Context context,
                                     List<PwSubscription> subscriptions)
                              throws PwException
        Call this to save or post subscription groups to the server. Make sure to call this outside of the UI thread. This call will tell the server to wipe out the existing subscription settings and subscribe to the subscriptions in the given list.
        Parameters:
        context - Context The application context.
        subscriptions - The subscription groups stored in the server will be replaced by this subscriptions group.
        Throws:
        PwException - If there is a network error or if there is no Internet.

      • setSubscriptionsLocalState

        public static void setSubscriptionsLocalState(android.content.Context context,
                                              List<PwSubscription> subscriptions)
        Update the subscription state based on the local (previously set) state.
        Parameters:
        context - The app context.
        subscriptions - The list of subscriptions.

      • setSubscriptionLocalState

        public static void setSubscriptionLocalState(android.content.Context context,
                                             PwSubscription subscription)

        public static void saveActiveSubscriptions(android.content.Context context,
                                           List<PwSubscription> subscriptions)
        Save the list of active subscriptions.
        Parameters:
        context - The application context.
        subscriptions - The list of subscriptions to save.
